alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 24 at 6:11AM AKDT until March 27 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 6 AM AKDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. Low visibility possible. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible Saturday night and Sunday. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will taper off early Friday morning. Snow is expected to develop Saturday evening and continue through Sunday night. Strong winds on Saturday night and Sunday could cause blizzard conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
